original_text: Now Zedekiah king of Judah had imprisoned him there, saying, “Why do you prophesy as you do? You say, ‘This is what the Lord says: I am about to give this city into the hands of the king of Babylon, and he will capture it.
korean_text: 유다 왕 시드기야가 이르되 네가 어찌하여 이같이 예언하였느냐 하고 그를 가두었음이었더라 이는 그가 예언하기를 여호와의 말씀에 보라 내가 이 성을 바벨론 왕의 손에 넘기리니 그가 차지할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Now Zedekiah king of Judah had imprisoned him there
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕 시드기야가 그를 그곳에 감금했었는데

sentences.original_text: Why do you prophesy as you do?
This is what the Lord says
I am about to give this city
into the hands of the king of Babylon
